```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

```

```{r plot1, layout = "l-body-outset"}
str(iris)

iris %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)) +
    geom_point(aes(color = Species)) +
    geom_smooth()

```
